column5: Yes I would move on, unless it was an ongoing issue. However in the moment I would have reacted the same way as you.
Yes I’ve always wondered...no matter how things ended they always come back or want to stay apart of my life usually.
That’s pretty trash, man. I’m sorry.
If you’ve had them all your life could be fordyce spots. Get them checked out to ease your mind, but you’re fine.
You should. I hope she finds out and presses charges. Poor girl.
I’m disgusted with how common this is. I’m sorry that happened to you.
I’m sorry that happened to you.
